title: John Lewis slash 20% off beauty advent calendar and it is worth £255
text:

Beauty advent calendars have been around for a good few years, but the year 2019 has brought an avalanche of offerings that are more extravagant than ever.

As the festive season gets closer, John Lewis has slashed 20% off its latest beauty advent calendar in store and online ahead of the 2019 Christmas countdown.

It would originally set shoppers back £150 - but with the 20% discount, shoppers can bag one for a reduced price of £120.

But the offer is only available until Monday, November 4 - so you'll need to get one soon if you want to get it cheaper.

The John Lewis & Partners Beauty Advent Calendar is filled with an array of indulgent skincare, hair, fragrance and make up treats that have a combined worth of £255. There's a total of 25 products hidden behind the drawers.

(Image: Getty)

The cream and metallic gold packaging is absolutely dreamy, meaning this fabulous countdown would make the perfect gift for a beautyholic (or a treat for yourself).

Beauty fans can expect to find all the top beauty brands, such as NARS, Laura Mercier and Charlotte Tilbury.

Even better, there's also an invitation to receive a complimentary gift or beauty service at one of the John Lewis in-store counters.

See below for a full list of the products inside.
